title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, May 13, 2020
description: “You ask, what is our aim? I can answer in one word: It is victory… for without victory, there is no survival.” – Winston Churchill to the House of Commons, May 13, 1940.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “You ask, what is our aim? I can answer in one word: It is victory… for without victory, there is no survival.” – Winston Churchill to the House of Commons, May 13, 1940.
